Ryze.name: Ryzeº
Ryze.title: ºøthe Rogue Mageº
Ryze.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThere are many on Runeterra who are attracted to the study of magic or, in recent times, the emerging field of techmaturgy. For most, pursuit of such knowledge is formalized in a college or university. The halls of traditional study were never for Ryze, however, who felt a more raw and primal connection to the magic of Runeterra than those who tried to teach him. He struck out on his own as a young man to discover what already called to him. Ryze traveled the world, seeking the wisdom of powerful hermits, witches, and shamans - anyone who had something to share beyond what was taught in the city-states of Valoran. When he had learned all he could from these fonts of wisdom, Ryze turned to seek the lost, forgotten, and forbidden knowledge in the world, delving into mystical worlds where others feared to tread.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºRyze's tireless searching for magical knowledge led him to an ancient form of spellcraft known as thorn magic. This art required Ryze to tattoo spells on his body, permanently infusing his being with vast arcane power and finally fulfilling his need to bond with the mystical energies of Runeterra. His travels also led him to uncover the giant indestructible scroll he now carries on his back - the purpose of the inscribed spell remains a secret only Ryze knows. He claims it is an abomination - something that he must safeguard from the world. This has piqued the curiosity of many, though no one is sure how to separate the scroll from Ryze, or if it is possible to overcome the rogue mage to do so. Since then, Ryze has joined the League of Legends to study the magical creatures and powerful will-workers that fight there, in order to complete his exploration of mystical Runeterra.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºø''Ryze is no longer just a mage - he has become a creature of magic itself.''ºøºøºøº
ºøºø-- High Councilor Heywan Relivashºøº
Ryze.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThere are many on Runeterra who are attracted to the study of magic or, in recent times, the emerging field of techmaturgy. For most, pursuit of such knowledge is ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøRyze can use himself as a conduit for his Spell Flux ability if there are no additional enemies to bounce the spell off of.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºUsing Ryze's ultimate to farm creeps can lead to a large gold advantage.ºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøBe cautious about engaging Ryze alone with less than full health.ºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøCleanse and Banshee's Veil are especially effective defenses against Ryze.ºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøRyze can only lock down one player with Rune Prison. Attacking with friends is the most effective approach, but remember to avoid Spell Flux bouncing between you and your allies.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºOverloadº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøRyze throws a charge of pure energy at an enemy for heavy damage and additional damage based upon Ryze's maximum mana.  Ryze also gains passive cooldown reduction.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºPassive: ºGains º{{ e2 }}ºø% cooldown reduction.øº

ºActive: ºDeals º{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus º{{ e3 }}ºø% of Ryze's maximum Mana ºøº(+{{ f1 }})ºø in magic damage. øº

spells.name: ºRune Prisonº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºRyze traps target enemy unit in a cage of runes, damaging them and preventing them from moving.  Also gains bonus damage based on Ryze's maximum mana.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøRoots an enemy for øº{{ e1 }}ºø second(s), dealing øº{{ e2 }} (+º{{ a1 }}) plus º{{ e3 }}ºø% of Ryze's maximum Mana ºøº(+{{ f1 }})ºø in magic damage. øº

spells.name: ºSpell Fluxº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøRyze releases an orb of pure magical power that deals damage and bounces from the initial target up to 6 times.  Also gains bonus damage based on Ryze's maximum mana.  Targets hit have their magic resistance reduced.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºøUnleashes an orb that bounces to enemies or Ryze up to 5 times. Each bounce deals øºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus º{{ e3 }}ºø% of Ryze's maximum Mana ºøº(+{{ f1 }})ºøºø magic damage and reduces Magic Resist by øºøº{{ e2 }}ºø for 5 seconds.º

spells.name: ºøDesperate Powerº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøRyze channels immense arcane power, he gains spell vamp and all of his spells deal area of effect damage.ºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøChannels immense arcane power gaining øºøº{{ e2 }}ºø% Spell Vamp, and øº{{ e4 }}ºøºøºø Movement Speed. Spells deal 50% area of effect damage for øºøºøº{{ e3 }}º seconds.º

passive.name: ºøArcane Masteryº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøWhen Ryze casts a spell, all other spells have their cooldown reduced by 1 second.øºøºøºøº
